Description: Square fragment of cartonnage painted, in white, blue, red, yellow and green, with a vignette from the Book of the Dead, showing the mummy lying on bier with its ba as a hawk hovering over.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 66
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
